cause.description:
We work to develop educated, skilled and courageous leaders to counter the ideological assault on Israel found on campuses, high schools, churches and in the general community.
See more at http://www.davidproject.org
1. Educate about the Arab-Israel Conflict
2. Advocate for Israel on Camuses, Highschools, Churches & the community.
3. Develop Leadership
cause.mission: Promote a Fair & Honest Understanding of the Arab-Israeli Conflict
cause.name: The David Project Center for Jewish Leadership
